@APStylebook INCORRECT.

neurodiversity = variations in human neurology

neurodiverse = includes ALL human beings
Groups can be neurodiverse, not individuals.

neurotypical = of typical neurological makeup

neurodivergent = not of typical neurological makeup (autistic, dyslexic, etc.)

neurodiversity = variations in human neurology

neurodiverse = includes ALL human beings
Groups c‚Ä¶
user_description:
18 | he/him | white | autistic | vegan üå± | satanist ñ§ê | queer üîª /trans, abro, gay, aspec/ |
animal liberation, human liberation #269 #veganfortheanimals
sourcetweet_text:
@APStylebook INCORRECT.

neurodiversity = variations in human neurology

neurodiverse = includes ALL human beings
Groups can be neurodiverse, not individuals.

neurotypical = of typical neurological makeup

neurodivergent = not of typical neurological makeup (autistic, dyslexic, etc.)

neurodiversity = variations in human neurology
